mapper.sql: id, dkey, dvalue, dmemo, display, dorder

id,

dmemo,

dmemo = #{dmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display = #{display,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dorder = #{dorder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
